abstract: Matthew Zames and Frank Bisignano were promoted to co-chief operating officers of the bank, while Jes Staley moved from being chief executive of the corporate and investment bank to chairman.
snippet: Matthew Zames and Frank Bisignano were promoted to co-chief operating officers of the bank, while Jes Staley moved from being chief executive of the corporate and investment bank to chairman.
lead_paragraph: Adjusting to a shifting banking landscape, JPMorgan Chase broadly reshuffled its management ranks on Friday and united some of its business operations.

headline.main: After Huge Loss, JPMorgan Rearranges Top Officials

abstract: Tepid economic growth at the outset of the election season. | A former JPMorgan lobbyist on banks and the financial crisis. | Why New York's failed bid to host the Olympics might be a good thing.
